overview.en: Matrexcoin (MAC) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Matrexcoin has a current supply of 90,000,000 with 22,176,440 in circulation. The last known price of Matrexcoin is 0.01210558 USD and is down -5.38 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 3 active market(s) with $0.02 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://matrexcoin.com/.
